thread.title: PhishLabs Named a Top-Performing Company
thread.title_full: PhishLabs Named a Top-Performing Company - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: PhishLabs Named a Top-Performing Company
text:
PhishLabs is one of the fastest growing firms in South Carolina
Charleston, SC (PRWEB) September 16, 2015
PhishLabs , the leading provider of 24/7 cybersecurity services that protect against the exploitation of people, announces that the company has been named to the Roaring Twenties list of top-performing companies in South Carolina for the third consecutive year. Presented annually by SC Biz News, the honor recognizes the state’s best performing companies based on both dollar and percentage increases in revenue from 2013 to 2014.
“Our growth is driven by our approach to fighting back against cyber threats,” said John LaCour, Founder and CEO of PhishLabs. “Being named to the Roaring Twenties for the third year in a row is further evidence of the value PhishLabs provides above and beyond traditional defenses.”
A profile of PhishLabs will be published in the winter issue of SCBIZ magazine . PhishLabs has grown quickly with an impressive client base of top global organizations including four of the top five U.S. financial institutions. In August, PhishLabs was ranked 1135 in the 2015 Inc. 5000 list of fastest-growing private companies in the U.S. The company boasts 376 percent three-year revenue growth.
As PhishLabs grows, it continues to recruit motivated and talented individuals that share a passion for fighting cybercrime. To stay abreast of job opportunities at PhishLabs, visit their careers page .
In June, the company launched Spear Phishing Protection, a groundbreaking new solution that is the first around-the-clock security service designed to disrupt spear phishing attacks before the compromise of targeted systems and data. The company also recently published “The CISO’s Guide to Spear Phishing Defense,” which established a strategic framework for protecting against spear phishing attacks. To download the guide, visit: http://info.phishlabs.com/the-cisos-guide-to-spear-phishing-defense
About PhishLabs
PhishLabs is the leading provider of 24/7 cybersecurity services that protect against threats that exploit people. The company is trusted by top organizations worldwide, including 4 of the 5 largest U.S. financial institutions. PhishLabs combines proprietary technology, intelligence, and human expertise to rapidly detect, analyze, and stop targeted cyberattacks before they impact organizations. Additionally, the company provides robust threat intelligence that strengthens existing cyber defenses and optimizes threat prevention. Leading organizations partner with PhishLabs to more effectively disrupt targeted cyberattacks, prevent data breaches, and reduce online fraud.
To learn more about PhishLabs, visit our website or email info[at]phishlabs[dot]com.
